document_data.name: Fir
document_data.mainbody: The '''fir''' was a type of tree that could be found in various places throughout [[Faerun]].
document_data.Habitats:
* The [[Ashenwood]] of [[Rashemen]].
* The east [[starwood]] area of the forest of [[Cormanthor]].<ref>
* Near [[Tower Reilloch]] on [[Evermeet]].
* In [[interior Faer√ªn]], fir trees could be found in the [[Winterwood]].{{Cite dragon/242/In the Bleak Deepwinter|70}}
* In the [[Unapproachable East]], fir trees could be found in the higher elevated reaches of the [[Yuirwood]] and lined the [[Rashemen]] shore of [[Lake Ashane]].
* Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], firs could be found in the valleys of [[Barovia]].
